data.name: INU
data.detailed_description:
INU is animated licking doge screenmate application.

Feature

  • Simple sprite animation.
  • Random-moving on screen, as top level window always.
  • Support Windows 11 and Windows 10 (need for DirectX 12, Feature level 12_0).

CommandLine Option

Usage:
inu.exe [quantity] [gaben]

Option:
quantity: Much INU (1-666).
gaben: Such easter egg.

INU Properties > GENERAL > LAUNCH OPTIONS

How to exit

Click the INU icon on taskbar-corner.

If you see of the following window

Unfortunately, your computer can't execute for INU application, let's uninstall and post much humorous review!

data.short_description: She run around the screen and disturb your work...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11, Windows 10 (Version 1703 or higher)
  • Processor: Celeron 3865U 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
